Operation Prevention

One of the biggest misconceptions about sudden cardiac arrest is that “it just happens” and there’s nothing you can do to stop it. The truth is that sudden cardiac arrest IS preventable — but that doesn’t happen by chance. Take 5 to Stay Alive and learn what you can do to save a life.

Take the Prevention Promise 5 To Stay Alive
